hexes() - Static method in class wordcram.Anglers
A WordAngler that draws all words at hexagonal angles, or (if you're a bit more mathy) 0π/6, 1π/6, 2π/6, 3π/6, 4π/6, and 5π/6.

wordcram - package wordcram
 
WordCram - Class in wordcram
WordCram is both the main API for WordCram, and the place where all the rendering happens.
WordCram(PApplet, Word[], WordFonter, WordSizer, WordColorer, WordAngler, WordPlacer, WordNudger) - Constructor for class wordcram.WordCram
Deprecated. Since WordCram 0.3. Use WordCram.WordCram(PApplet) and the builder fluent API instead.
WordCram(PApplet, Word[], WordFonter, WordSizer, WordColorer, WordAngler, WordPlacer) - Constructor for class wordcram.WordCram
Deprecated. Since WordCram 0.3. Use WordCram.WordCram(PApplet) and the builder fluent API instead.
WordCram(PApplet) - Constructor for class wordcram.WordCram
Make a new WordCram.
